title: WTO chief Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala on vaccine nationalism: 'No one is safe until everyone is safe'
description: The incoming chief of the World Trade Organisation, Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, told Reuters her top priority was to ensure the WTO does more to address the pandemic.
